          <title>
            <string language="en">Antibiotic resistance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antibiotischer Widerstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résistance antibiotique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resistência antibiótica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Resistenza antibiotica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιβιοτική αντίσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resistencia antibiótica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a doctor advising her patient not to overuse antibiotics to avoid the risk of developing antibiotic resistance.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antibiotic resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">doctor patient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">immune system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">resistant strain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sickness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">treatment</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Doktor, der ihrem 
Patienten, rät Antibiotika nicht zu überbeanspruchen, um die Gefahr 
des Entwickelns des antibiotischen Widerstandes zu vermeiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un docteur informant son 
patient ne pas abuser des antibiotiques pour éviter le risque de 
développer la résistance antibiotique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um doutor que recomenda 
seu paciente não overuse antibióticos para evitar o risco de 
desenvolver a resistência antibiótica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un medico che 
raccomanda il suo paziente di non overuse gli antibiotici per evitare 
il rischio di sviluppare la resistenza antibiotica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν γιατρό που 
συμβουλεύει τον ασθενή της για να μην καταχραστεί τα αντιβιοτικά 
για να αποφύγει τον κίνδυνο την αντιβιοτική αντίσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a doctor que aconseja a
su paciente no overuse los antibióticos para evitar el riesgo de 
desarrollar resistencia antibiótica.</string>
          </description>
